findings.title: F-2023-0258 - Unnecessary receive() function
findings.description: The Defimint contract presently accepts native tokens using the `receive()` function, but there is currently no mechanism for users to directly withdraw tokens accidentally sent to the contract.

findings.title: F-2023-0310 - Token transfers may not be compatible for non-standard ERC20 tokens
findings.description: The `wTokens()` function may not work correctly with non-standard ERC20 tokens, potentially locking them in the contract.

findings.title: F-2023-0256 - Floating Pragma
findings.description: The project uses a floating pragma which may result in contracts being deployed using the wrong pragma version, different from the one they were tested with.

findings.title: F-2023-0257 - Missing Zero Address Check
findings.description: In `Defimint.sol` contract, address parameters are used without proper validation against a zero address `(0x0)` check.

findings.title: F-2023-0315 - Owner Can Renounce The Ownership Of The Contract
findings.description: The owner of the Defimint contract has a full authority on renouncing the ownership by calling the `renounceOwnership()` function, which may lead to losing all ownership-related controls and making the authority on the contract inaccessible.
